abstract: In congressman’s letter to the F.D.A., the Best Sweet plant in Mooresville, N.C., is revealed as the maker of millions of Rolaids recalled by Johnson & Johnson.
snippet: In congressman’s letter to the F.D.A., the Best Sweet plant in Mooresville, N.C., is revealed as the maker of millions of Rolaids recalled by Johnson & Johnson.
lead_paragraph: Best Sweet, a maker of candy and chewy over-the-counter drug products in Mooresville, N.C., made the millions of Rolaids soft chews involved in a recall last week by a unit of Johnson & Johnson, according to Representative Darrell Issa, Republican of California.

headline.main: N. C. Plant Found to Be Maker of Recalled Rolaids
headline.print_headline: North Carolina Plant Made Rolaids Recalled by J.&J.
